Look for all users of the project and check if they are allowed to see it

Look for all users of the process and check if they are allowed to see it

checkVersion([version])

Checks if the version is supported or not. If not, returns an error message.

Module Contents¶

code_SemperKI.utilities.basics.manualCheckIfUserMaySeeProject(session, userID: str, projectID: str) → bool¶

Look for all users of the project and check if they are allowed to see it

Parameters:

  • userID (str) – The hashID of the user

  • projectID (str) – The projectID of the project in question

Returns:

True if the user belongs to the rightful, false if not

Return type:

Bool

code_SemperKI.utilities.basics.manualCheckIfUserMaySeeProcess(session, userID: str, processID: str) → bool¶

Look for all users of the process and check if they are allowed to see it

Parameters:

  • userID (str) – The hashID of the user

  • processID (str) – The processID of the process in question

Returns:

True if the user belongs to the rightful, false if not

Return type:

Bool

code_SemperKI.utilities.basics.checkIfUserMaySeeProcess(json=False)¶

Check whether a user may see details about this process or not.

Parameters:

json (Bool) – Controls if the output is in JSON Format or not

Returns:

Response whether the user may see the process or not. If so, call the function.

Return type:

HTTPRespone/JSONResponse, Func
